summary: Todo manager script inspired by todo.txt and org-mode
name: Vimtodo
description:
Vimtodo originally started out as a set of syntax highlights for the todo.txt
(http://www.todotxt.com/) format in vim with a few added extras such as
subtasks. However, it quickly grew into a more fully featured task management
system, taking several ideas from Emacs' org-mode.

Github: http://github.com/mivok/vimtodo
install_details: Untar to ~/.vim (only autoload, ftplugin, doc, syntax dirs are needed). If using pathogen, untar to ~/.vim/bundle/vimtodo.
